long_description: 6 of our New Panther Martin Deluxe Holographic Spinners 3 each in sizes 1/8 oz and 1/4 oz. These lures have our fish catching holographic patterns coloring along with our tried and true deluxe bodies. They are sure to catch more trout,bass,pike,salmon,steelhead and walleye than ever.
